verbs.description: Just days after a deadly anti - Muslim attack on a public train , an upcoming and potentially violent clash of pro - Trump and anti - racist activists in Portland , Oregon [V: has] put the city over the edge .

[ARGM-TMP: Just days after a deadly anti - Muslim attack on a public train] , [ARG0: an upcoming and potentially violent clash of pro - Trump and anti - racist activists in Portland , Oregon] has [V: put] [ARG1: the city] [ARG2: over the edge] .
